trophies.trophyDetail: Platinum Trophy
Tutorial clear! Let's keep up the good work as Hamonaiza! (Yum)
Yeah, let's go through the ruins, little by little. There's no need to rush.So, please don't be reckless. (Hina)
Yes yes! We're well on our way through the ruins! Let's keep going up to the next level! (Yum)
Let's just go through the ruins and catch the former Demon King. Let's finish it quickly. (???)
All sorts of people come to Hell. The longer you don't mind, the longer you can keep going good life. Well, let's aim for the next level. (Yum)

When we are harmonizers, we are asked to do a lot of different jobs. Sometimes we get to consult on the residents' problems, sometimes we get to run around the ruins. Yeah, it's a lot of things. (Hina)
Hamonaiza, we're always looking for you! If you're interested, check out the employment information and work rules! That's about it, hahaha. (Yum)
In Hell, we receive a lot of letters, packages, and other things from outside of Hell. From Heaven, Interval, and many other places. (Hina)
There's the former Demon King on the level 10. Let's just capture them and finish the training! At any rate, this ruin is a tall building. It's not good for our legs. (Yum)
Ah, yes, let's catch the former Demon King. When we catch them, I guess we'll have a sermon contest... (Hina)
The 20th of every month is our payday. Yeah, let's think carefully about how we spend our money. (Hina)
The transporter room, you see, is a facility that you can use to transfer goods. Why don't you give it a [TRY]? (Leeds)
The employment office is exactly what the name implies. If you're short on staff, you should come by. (Heathersh)
Ah, do you have fragments of the book? If you have them, please come to the binding room. I'll repair it. (Imram)

trophies.trophyName: One Year Passed Since Become a Harmonizer
trophies.trophyDetail: It's been a year since you came to this section! Time goes by so fast. I feel like I'm getting older. Let's continue to have fun in the future. (Yum)
Yeah, it's also our job to capture the people who got away. First our goal is 5 people. (Hina)
It looks like there are quite a few people still living in the ruins. I guess our goal is to capture 15 of them. (Hina)
Looks like there are still some of the inhabitants left in the ruins. I wonder if we'll capture them all and have a sermon contest. (Hina)
The rating of Hamonaiza is very important. The higher it is, the higher the salary will be. First, let's aim for rank 10. (Yum)
Hamonaiza's rating, it's important. This will also be asked in the exam. Well, it's a lie, hahaha. Let's aim for a good Hamonaiza. So, let's aim for rank of 25. (Yum)
The rating of the Hamonaiza is very important. Let's accumulate work and trust to become a high Hamonaiza. When you reach rank 50, you're a full-fledged Hamonaiza! (Yum)
Even in Hell, you still need money to shop. If I have about 50,000 coins, we can buy a lot of things. (Hina)

trophies.trophyName: Let's Try to Get Make 100,000 Coins
trophies.trophyDetail: Shops are a good place for us to get ready to explore. In that case, yeah, we'll need some coins. I feel like I could buy a lot of stuff with 100,000 coins. (Hina)

trophies.trophyName: Let's Try to Get Make 250,000 Coins
trophies.trophyDetail: The section's shops will also sell products to the Harmonizers that they do not sell to other residents. I feel like I can buy whatever I want with 250,000 coins. (Hina)

trophies.trophyName: Let's Make a Shopping Spree Worth 50,000 Coins!
trophies.trophyDetail: If you need to do shopping, come on down to Hellmart! Well, other shops are fine, too. The best way to learn about the section is to shop! How about spending a quick 50,000 coins? I'd also recommend having a meal. (Galan)

trophies.trophyName: Let's Make a Shopping Spree Worth 100,000 Coins!
trophies.trophyDetail: Hellmart is open all year round! The pay for that is... well, that's just the way it is. The best way to learn about the section is to shop! Why don't you try spending 100,000 coins or so quickly? There are all sorts of shops, like toolmaker and stuffed animal shop. (Galan)

trophies.trophyName: Let's Make a Shopping Spree Worth 250,000 Coins!
trophies.trophyDetail: Be sure to head over to Hellmart for your magazine! There are no magazines in the library. The best way to learn about the section is to shop! Why don't you try spending 250,000 coins or so quickly? You could buy some jewelry. (Galan)
There's a lot to discover when we explore every nook and cranny, I highly recommend it, let's explore all 5 or so. (Yum)
Hamonaiza does a lot of footwork. Exploring is a daily occurrence. Thanks to this, my shoes are always overworked. But aside from that, let's explore all 10 places. (Yum)

We find a lot of things as we explore. Mushrooms, cabbages and so on. It's a good idea to get used to exploring and to be able to call yourself a exploration master. We'll explore all 15 or so places. (Yum)
There is a training center for harmonizers in the section. You can choose from four different training course. Any of them will do, but you might want to complete one first. (Chief)
There are also more advanced training centers available. Any of them will do, but you might want to try completing one first. Don't loosen up, even if it's training. (Chief)
I'm currently working on creating my own awesome training center. I hope you'll experience and completion of the course. (Rimis)
Hamonaiza's work includes solving the problems of the residents of the section. Let's start by solving about 5 cases. (Yum)
Residents of the section have a lot of problems. This is a painful headache. If you can help, good luck with that. Let's resolve about 10 of them and get the hang of it. (Yum)
When we live in a section, we need a lot of things. As a hamonaiza, let's do our best to make the lives of our residents better. Once you resolve 30 of their problems, you'll be used to it. (Yum)
You can give the residents a variety of presents. They'll be especially happy if it's something they like. So why don't you give them 30 of them? (Hina)
Often, what you don't need is very necessary to someone else. So, yes, it's a good idea to deliver them to someone who needs them. Let's take the plunge and give about 60 presents. (Hina)
It would be nice to be able to thank the residents of the section for their help or something like that, who have been with us in our exploration. Yeah, maybe we could give them 100 presents. (Hina)

You've chosen Moduku as your collaborator. That's a good choice. However, just as the word <the right person for the right job> exists, so too do Moduku have their own strengths and weaknesses. Even if Moduku is a seaweed that is beyond the reach of human knowledge, I would say no, if you ask me if it is best to take it to all places. At any rate, you should enjoy [THE WORLD OF MODUKU]. (Moduku)
Are you going to start keeping cabbages, too? They peel off pretty easily, so please treat them well. (Rafilz)

[WELCOME TO INTERVAL]. Interval is that space between the world of the dead and the world of the living, where the dead are assigned to go to Heaven or Hell. I send a lot of people to hell every day. I leave it to the harmonizers in Hell to deal with the rest. Good luck. Yeah, it's roughly like this. (Interval Administrator)
